text: Lady Liberty (Italian: La mortadella) is a 1971 Italian French comedy movie. It was directed by Mario Monicelli. Actors include Sophia Loren, William Devane, Susan Sarandon, Danny DeVito, and Gigi Proietti. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Mario Monicelli
title: Lady Liberty (movie)
